Pre-reqs: GEOG 310.
Note: This is a wait list for GEOG 412, Section 101, Term 1. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
Note: This is a wait list for GEOG 412, section 201 in term 2. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
courseName: Water Management: Theory, Policy, and Practice.
description: Interdisciplinary analysis of critical water issues, in Canada and internationally. Focus on social science perspectives. Emphasis on presentation, research, and essay-writing skills.
